inclusion.criterion: A 30 French Foley will be placed either digitally or with speculum assistance.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The fetal heart rate tracing will be monitored for 1 hour after Foley placement.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient will be sent home if the following criteria are met: the fetal heart rate tracing is reactive and category I;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: there is no evidence of rupture of membranes, spontaneous labor, or vaginal Pregnant women at ≥37 weeks gestation by reliable dating criteria as determined by the American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists (i.e. gestational age supported by one of the following: ultrasound prior to 20 weeks of gestation, fetal heart tones auscultated by Doppler for 30+ weeks, or documented serum or urine pregnancy test 36+ weeks ago)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Scheduled induction of labor with indication and timing supported by the Family Birth Center induction of labor guideline entitled "Induction of labor: Indications and Timing"
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Amniotic fluid index greater than or equal to 5 centimeters
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Formal prenatal ultrasound documenting the absence of placenta previa
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The woman is able to give appropriate consent and has undergone an informed consent process.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: the patient may receive pharmacologic pain relief in the form of one dose of acetaminophen and/or fentanyl.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: The patient will be instructed to return to the Family Birth Center at 0700 the following day. She will be given detailed verbal and written instructions of when to contact and return to the Family Birth Center before the morning. She will be provided with the 24 hour direct access line for the Family Birth Center to call with any questions or concerns.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: If the Foley catheter is expulsed at home, she is to record the time of expulsion.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 42-year-old healthy woman came to the clinic to have her flu shot in early October. She works in a rehab center and has no underlying disease.
